effect.shortEffect: This Pokémon's moves have double power against Pokémon that switched in this turn.
effect.full: This Pokémon's moves have double power against Pokémon that switched in this turn.

description.sun-moon: Doubles the damage dealt to the target’s replacement if the target switches out.
description.ultra-sun-ultra-moon: Doubles the damage dealt to the target’s replacement if the target switches out.
description.lets-go-pikachu-lets-go-eevee: Doubles the damage dealt to the target’s replacement if the target switches out.
description.sword-shield: Doubles the damage dealt to the target’s replacement if the target switches out.
